NewsLines.HeadLine: Oh, Roy! Phils Ace Halladay No-Hits Reds To Kick Off NLDS

ContentItem.DataContent: Philadelphia Phillies ace Roy Halladay no-hit the Cincinnati Reds Wednesday in game 1 of the NLDS. The Phils beat the Reds 4-0 and Halladay became the second pitcher to throw a no-no in postseason history (Yanks' Don Larsen tossed a perfect game the 1956 World Series).

NewsLines.HeadLine: Oh, Roy! Phils Ace Halladay No-Hits Reds To Kick Off NLDS
Seeds Flourish At CWG Tennis; England's O'Brien Tumbles

ContentItem.DataContent: Top seeds Somdev Devvarman of India and Australia's Anastasia Rodionova highlighted second-round winners Wednesday by dismissing their opponents in the men's and women's singles tennis event, respectively, at the 2010 Commonwealth Games.

NewsLines.HeadLine: Seeds Flourish At CWG Tennis; England's O'Brien Tumbles
Surgery Completed: Phils' Doc Tosses No-Hitter In NLDS Opener Vs. Reds

ContentItem.DataContent: Roy Halladay made his playoff debut a special one, tossing a a no-hitter to lead the Philadelphia Phillies over the Cincinnati Reds 4-0 in game one of the NLDS Wednesday. 'Doc' allowed just one walk in a masterful performance

NewsLines.HeadLine: Surgery Completed: Phils' Doc Tosses No-Hitter In NLDS Opener Vs. Reds
Baylor's Dunn Arrested, Suspended For Alleged Assault Of Girlfriend

ContentItem.DataContent: Baylor senior guard LaceDarius Dunn, one of the key members of the Bears' run to the Elite Eight last season, has been indefinitely suspended following his arrest in Waco, Texas, on charges of aggravated assault involving his girlfriend, the school announced Tuesday.

NewsLines.HeadLine: Baylor's Dunn Arrested, Suspended For Alleged Assault Of Girlfriend
Lee Stellar As Rangers Take ALDS Game 1 From Rays

ContentItem.DataContent: Cliff Lee worked up and down the strike zone for seven innings of one-run ball as the Texas Rangers notched a 5-1 victory over the Rays in Tampa Wednesday afternoon. The win gives the underdog Rangers a 1-0 lead in their American League Division Series.

NewsLines.HeadLine: Lee Stellar As Rangers Take ALDS Game 1 From Rays
